    Methods inherited from interface org.apache.ignite.configuration.ConfigurationProperty

  • Method Details

    • update

      CompletableFuture<Void> update(VIEWT change)
      Update this configuration node value.
      Parameters:
      change - New value for the configuration. Must not be null.
      Returns:
      Future that signifies end of the update operation. Can also be completed with ConfigurationValidationException and ConfigurationChangeException.
